jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Endoscopy Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Endoscopy Nurse works within the endoscopy or gastroenenterology unit of a hospital or medical center and assists in procedures in which an endoscope is used. The Endoscopy Nurse provides assistance with sedation and post-procedure care.  1+ year of recent Endoscopy RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
